comments.body:
Great idea i was thinking that they could shoot seeds and other things like that but darts do sound interesting

mabye make special darts with iron or gold nuggets seeing as they don't really have a big purpose in the game
I think this is a stupid idea, since you will need to first find bamboo and then also a cactus in the desert, this does not even take into account that it does little damage.

In Adventure Mode, lecterns are automatically locked, but this doesn't apply to Survival. This would be a good addition for redstone devices where different pages do different things, so that the pages don't get messed up. Just make sure that the comparator is not affected by the redstone torch.

In the meantime, you can set so that when the comparator output is 0, a piston door closes so you can't leave until you put the book back.
I can't believe this hasn't been implemented yet.
no
That doesn't really make any sense. How would burning a Zombie Head turn it into a human Steve Head?
because it burns all of the poison off the head
It's burning the infection and his face at the same time!
Might I remind you that Zombies are really weak against fire.
ok i agree this post was stupid. maybe it should make a skeleton head
@Eric Bambrick Don't put so much weight on yourself Eric.
@Eric Bambrick I'm still not so sure about the skeleton head idea but it makes much more sense. Edit your post to say that. :)
maybe if you find one it would have a chest with redstone stuff in it.
It makes more sense for it pulling in it faster. Don't add the knock back though.
How about Granite, Diorite, and andesite all make tools that have the same stats as Stone tools, but look differently. Then these blocks won't be as useful to the average player.
I would do that but they have weaker durability then Stone when being mined. That's why I made them not as strong.

You can't place commands blocks in survival because they are an unknown indestructible block. The player(when in survival) doesn't know what the block can do because you can't even get it without commands.
maybe you should have to put a setting on them in creative to do this.
Maybe they need to be nerfed significantly. It needs to be linked to a container to perform commands like /setblock and /fill,...

Does it bother you that on your favorite server you can't build parkour with commands like "/title"?

To solve this, it should be possible to craft, place, and open a command block in survival mode (of course there would be no "op" commands).

This option will bring about a significant breakthrough in the world of construction, parkour, and escape rooms on servers that are in survival mode (even if there are no "op" commands).

If you use commands a lot, or just like the idea, vote for the post, follow, and maybe we'll see it in Minecraft!
Podzol update 4 ever!!!
This isn't Minecraft based.
Use a Book.
Water can't exist in the Nether even when splashed because it evaporates too fast.
This is actually a good idea.
Feloldani az felületet bírjuk ingyen jaccani

Looks like a block, acts like a block, let's put it in Blocks, Tools, and Items  :)

Thank you!
This should be in the Biome and Dimension category.
That's honestly not a bad idea.
It could only generate in a Kelp forest biome, or it might generate when a kelp plant that has reached the surface grows further...
You can auto-stack buckets that are in your hot-bar back into your inventory by shift+clicking them. All you need is one empty inventory space (or one stack of buckets that is not full, yet).
i meant in the fact that you wouldnt have to go into your inventory, they would be all stack back right when they empty
No one is poor in Minecraft so don't say that they're poor.
I don't see this being a thing because the size of the bucket doesn't change so therefore it wouldn't be stackable.
I don't understand why it needs Flint and Steel.
It's not cheating. It's a faster way to craft more then one item and helps you memorize the recipes. You need to craft(the item) it first then you can use the Recipe Book. Otherwise it's useless.
It doesn’t need flint and steel, you use the ingredients (2) like how you would make a flint and steel.
I know it’s not cheating but it makes me feel like a noob. Also Minecraft players should know most recipes.

It's not even close to cheating and it shouldn't make you feel bad, most pro's and speedrunners use it to save time, would you rather put EVERY single stack in for the recipe of hay bales or would you rather click 2 buttons and have an entire stack?
I totally agree. I've been wanting to have users combine custom items in my addon that they are specifically supposed to learn by heart.
I'd love Lantern Posts.  They'd be great along pathways.

Hi there!

We appreciate this feedback! In order to help us figure out how we can adjust things in the future - how do you see the crossbow working? Feel free to edit your post with some ideas or more thoughts to help us get a great discussion going on the changes you think would work best.

Thanks! :)

This is true, Bow still seems like the superior weapon in every way to me.

In my oponion, Power, Infinity and Flame should be applicable for crossbows.

It's good at clearing many enemies at once, you cant hit a single enemy multiple times with multi shot and piercing, so it seems like a small amount of damage, but against multiple targets total damage becomes very high. Also, multi shot doesn't split the damage

I also agree, crossbows do seem under powered. There could be and upgrade to multi-shot one with multishot two.      Multi-shot two would shoot the arrows in more of a cluster instead of a line, like in the shape of a small triangle with each arrow being at a different point. This motivates the player to use the crossbow when they want to get close to a mob, but still be farther away to stay safe. The downside to multi-shot two, though, is that it takes longer to charge. This prevents it from being broken and overpowered.

make projectiles (aka arrows) dont bounces when you hit 2 at the same entity

please that would make crossbow multishot useful and

also fixes the bug where you make the arrow bounce when you lag on server.

I dont even think more enchantments would be necessary. I dont think the crossbow would need a power enchantment or complete overhaul.

What would make it way more balanced is hitting all 3 arrows in multishot 1. It is still less powerfull than a flame power 5 bow with infinity in long range but makes up for the lack of power enchantments in very close range. I do think tho that the quick charge enchantments should make the crossbow superior in speed regarding the bow, which it doesnt do. To me it seems like mojang forgot that the crossbow is a better bow in reallife. It could be enchanted to a sniper or shotgun like bow when enchabted to piercing or multishot which would make it way less flat.

nah i got an idea

fletching table should get a function, that being both making iron and gold nugget arrows (iron ones have a 50% change to be retrievable after hitting a target and do a bit more damage)
(gold ones do even more damage but (alike regular arrows) cannot be retrieved once hitting a target and armour resistance is more impactful to its damage)

 

and also adding things to bows and crossbows, things like a pair of shears added to the table with a bow or crossbow adds a tag under it 'trimmed' so that they draw faster but launch the arrow slower
things like goat horn or iron could make it 're enforced' and give it a bit higher arrow speed and damage and range alongside more durability
adding iron or goat horn the second time, or adding stripped wood (not logs or planks) the first time would add the 'stressed' tag under the bow or crossbow (bows cannot take iron) and give it alot of power but a long drawing time

for bows, the stronger ones draw slower and have a smaller window once dawn to shoot before the shot is inaccurate
for crossbows, the stronger ones would lose durability over time whilst loaded and take longer to charge, perhaps we get an item that you must hold in the offhand in order to draw it like a tool or smth

these changes give the fletching table a use alongside

It appears there is already an existing thread on this topic (or something very similar). Feel free to join that discussion in progress. Cutting down on threads with very similar ideas will ideas to stay together so they can receive the attention they deserve from our developers. Even though you may not agree with all the exact ideas in the other thread(s), we love it when the community works together on ideas!

Thanks for your contribution.
It should also be able to convert nuggets (such as iron and gold) into ingots.
This sounds like a bad idea, because limiting redstone would break so much stuff and cause a huge uproar. Also, there are tons of mods that add this stuff. Just use them.
I had the same idea and I think its great to add to the game. Yes it will break stuff but It would be amazing and great and would bring a lot of challanges to the game.
Ok i like it but i want a sonic exe mob spaner
not sure which version you are playing, but this is already totally a thing in Java 1.13

If there’s a way to place either an item frame or map piece horizontally on a surface in vanilla Minecraft, I can’t find it.

As for marking locations on the map, that feature already exists.  You just need to create a banner, name it at an anvil, place it at the target location, then “use” the map on it.  I’ve done this quite extensively in my world and have dozens of markers on my map wall.
This is already a suggestion thankfully.
This isn't so much a pet idea, as it is an adjustment to the collar, so clarified and moved topic. I'm betting there's way more to this idea, so if needed, we can always move it back.
Would this just be like a decorative pendant, or would it serve other purposes like giving attributes to the pet?
I like this... it adds personality to your pets as well, as long as the color of the collar and the chip is independent, so you could create combinations. Also, don't forget quartz.
Clarified that a bit because the topic should focus more on a soul sand, not a wither skeleton change. :)
Thank you.
What would a stone nugget be used for?
Sorry but Magma Blocks are just so hot that they damage the payer but never burn them.
I'm sorry to here about your hot tub problem but that shouldn't be why Magma Blocks should not do damage underwater.
